title: 10 Edible Pranks! FUNNY PRANK WARS! Halloween Edition

json.text: Wengie: Hey guys, it's Wengie, welcome back, and creepy hug!

Wengie: But, today, I'm doing ten pranks for Halloween, they're pretty fun, but actually a little bit scary, so do them at your own risk, and right now, we're running a Mac - Book Air giveaway, so if you guys wanna join this giveaway, just join this wonderful family, we like to celebrate things like Halloween, so, click the subscribe button down below, and don't forget to click the bell to get notifications, the only other thing you guys need to do is, to join my second channel, ReactiCorns, which is linked down below, and today, we have another Halloween like challenge, let's get this video to a hundred, and sixty - nine thousand likes, so I'm gonna give you guys three seconds to do that, 3,2, 1; have you guys clicked it yet?
Wengie: And without further ado, let's check on these pranks! Let's go!
Wendy: Wengie, have you ever broken your nose?
Wengie: What? No, have you? ❓
Wendy: Yeah, and ever since then, I'll be able to break it, and reset it whenever I want!
Wengie: What? That's impossible! ❓
Wendy: Want a bet? Watch this!
Wengie: Did you guys know that biting down on uncooked pasta kind of sounds like bones breaking? Check this out!
Wengie: Pretty convincing right, now, just add some fake blood under your nose as you do it, and you'll completely freak out your friends!
Wendy: Ow, ow, I think I did too much, this time, ahhh!
Wengie: What on earth, Wendy, did you do, it's bleeding!
Wendy: Owwww! It hurts, it hurts, Wengie!
Wengie: Oh, hold on, hold on, I'm going to get help! ✋
Wengie: Hey Wendy, make sure you lock your doors!
Wendy: What? Why? ❓
Wengie: People around here are obscene sightings of the Slender Man, they'll take control of your mind, and make you go crazy!
Wendy: You don't believe in that stuff, do you? ❔
Wengie: Just be careful, okay!
Wendy: Okay, fine!

Wengie: The Slender Man was an urban myth, that had people freaking out, and today, we're gonna make the myth come to life, all you need is a roll of black wrapping paper, just roll it on a flat, hard surface, and trace an outline of a tall slender figure on the paper, you can do this freehand, or have a friend, use your own outline as a guide, now, just cut it out, and you're pretty much done, honestly, it looks pretty creepy already, so we're gonna use some blue tac, and stick it up at the end of this hallway, and wait for our victim to stumble upon it!
Wendy: Ahhhh!
Wengie: Hey Wendy, Wendy, Wendy, guess what I got from the garden!
Wendy: Aw, hey, that actually looks pretty cute!
Wendy: Oh, wait, I think you have some little, extra, little friends there!
Wengie: Oh, yeah, right, don't worry, I'll get rid of them!

Wengie: This prank will have your victim gagging, and super grossed out, you'll need some bendy straws, chocolate, and strawberry milk, Oreos, and gelatine powder, first thing you need to do, is to take your bendy straws, and stretch them out completely!

Wengie: Next, stick some tape to seal the bottom of the straws, I've used this method in a few of my edible school supplies videos, so, make sure to check them out if you haven't already, next, pour out some milk into a small pot, and then, add about a teaspoon of gelatine, boil it over the stove, and then, pour it into your bendy straw, I transferred it into a small pouring container first to make it easier!
Wengie: Then, just let it set overnight in the fridge, now, remove the tape from the straws, and just squeeze your gummy worms out!

Wengie: I ended up using different portions of strawberry, and chocolate milk, to make a few of these gummy worms because actual worms are sometimes darker, and sometimes lighter, next, you want to take some Oreos, and remove the icing from the middle, place them into a freezer bag, and crush them up using anything heavy!

Wengie: While I prank, I'm gonna pour these crushed Oreos into a cute tin to make it look like  soil, and then, place a few fake flowers in the middle, then, take your gummy worms, and just lay them on the soil, and guys, these actually look so real, don't you think, try having them pop out of the soil as well, and it look super convincing, I actually put this in my fridge overnight, so the cats wouldn't eat it, and the worms shrunk a little bit overnight, and looks even more real afterwards, which was crazy!
Wendy: Ahh! Eww!
Wengie: Mmm, the dirt's good too!
Wendy: What?
Wengie: Want one?
Wendy: No!
Wengie: They're really yummy!
Wengie: You can freak someone out in the middle of the night with this easy prank!

Wengie: All you need to do is, find some creepy sounds from the internet like ghosts, or voices, and use any simple audio program to make a six - hour long audio file, make it silent, and place these creepy sounds in the middle of the track!
(Noise)

Wengie: Now, export the track, and transfer it onto your phone, now, all you need to do, is set the trap before your victim goes to sleep, and they'll totally freak out in the middle of the night, this is not to be used on the faint - hearted, guys, just a warning!
Wendy: Good night Wengie, sleep dreams!
(Noise)
Wengie: Hello, who's there?

Wengie: Wendy loves Reese, they're basically her favourite Halloween snack, but we're gonna prepare a nasty surprise for her, open up a Reese, and flip it upside down, next, cut out a small square on the bottom of the Reese, and lift it up, and remove a bit of the peanut filling!
Wengie: Now, squeeze some spicy siracha sauce into the hole, and then, cover it back with the square chocolate piece, and now, you're ready to make your friends super mad!
Wendy: Do not eat, it's for the kids' trick-or-treat!
Wendy: I guess one won't hurt!
Wendy: Uh,  Wengie!
Wendy: Hey Wengie, I made some snacks for the neighbours, you want to try them out first!
Wengie: Okay, sure!
Wendy: Okay, so I literally made these by myself, and my blood, sweat, tears, and fingers!
Wengie: Wait, what was the last thing you said again? ❔
Wendy: Uhh, blood, sweat, and tears!
Wengie: Huh? Never mind!
Wendy: Here you go!
Wengie: Prank your friends with this funny Halloween snack, you need some hot dogs, sausages, some buns, and some ketchup!
Wengie: Cut out your sausages in two finger length pieces, and then, cut a flap off the end like this, which kind of makes it looks like a fingernail! ✂️

Wengie: Next, cut a few slits into the length of the hot dog four finger creases,  now, pop it into your bun, and add some ketchup for the blood for the final touch, wrap up your hand with some  bandages, and smear some fake blood on it, to make look like you're injured yourself, and you're ready to serve your fingers to your friend!
Wendy: Here, you go!
Wengie:Oh, on second thoughts, don't worry about it, fine! ❔
Wendy: Oh, okay, then!
Wendy: Wengie, I'm home, huh?
Wendy: Wengie!

Wengie: Now, this prank is a little more elaborate, and it's definitely not for the faint - hearted, guys, to proceed with caution, first of all, you'll need a large black garbage bag, and some tape, next, fill up the bag with some rubbish, or whatever you like, basically, you need to portion it onto three sections like this, to mimic a body! ⚠️

Wengie: Now, place it into the bathtub, and add some shoes at the bottom for  the finishing touch, next, take some ketchup, and smear it around the walls, and floor, and leave a trail leading to the bathroom, so, now the set - up is done, just wait for your victim to walk into the trap!
Wendy: Ahhhh!
Wengie: Make some spooky Halloween eyes, using some toilet rolls, and glow - sticks, just draw a few mean looking eyes shapes on the toilet rolls, and cut them out carefully!

Wengie: Then, just pop a glow - stick inside, they don't look like much right now, but in the dark, you'll see instead of creepy eyes peering at you, these are the best when you put them outside in a bush, because they don't know what is on the other side, they are best to try on a younger brother, or sister because I personally find them pretty cute looking, you can also use these with super cool Halloween decor when you're throwing a party!

Wengie: Wendy hates bugs, but who doesn't, so this prank is gonna totally freak her out, just buy some plastic, creepy crawlies, and use some blue tac to stick them on a wall, preferably near a bench, or any other hole, so it looks like there's actually a bug infestation, and that's pretty much it, now you're ready for your prank!
Wendy: Ahhh!

Wengie: This simple prank will totally  catch your victim of God whether it's your sibling, or roommate, just sneak into the bathroom during the shower, and bring some hand soap, use the soap to write a creepy message on the mirror like ' I can see you!', the soap prevents the mirror from steaming up, and they'll get a scare when they come out of the shower!
Wengie: Who's watching me? ❔
Wengie: Okay guys, which ones were your favourite, were you scared by any of them, or would you guys like, try any of these pranks, and also,  let's check out what happened on ReactiCorns, this week!
Max: Roses are red, violets are red, everything is red!
(Laughing)
Wengie: That's so good!
Max: That is good!
Wengie & Max: That's alright, he has a blindfold, everything is red!

Wengie: Don't forget to follow me on my social media, guys, during, I do all the behind-the-scenes, and yes, pretty cut check out what's happening in  my life there, and until next week, I'm gonna miss you guys so much, so I'll see you guys soon, bye guys, love you!
